meanings.definition: A person or thing that mounts.
meanings.sent1: The mounters helped secure the painting on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The mounters attached the TV to the stand.
meanings.sent3: The mounters tried to ride the wild horse, but it was too fast!
meanings.sent4: The mounters of the art exhibition carefully placed each painting in its spot.
meanings.sent5: The mounters of the flag on the pole did so with precision and care.

meanings.sent1: The mounters in the group all had different skills.
meanings.sent2: The mounters gathered to discuss their next project.
meanings.sent3: The mounters decided to form a team to tackle the challenge.
meanings.sent4: The mounters stood proudly together, ready to take on any task.
meanings.sent5: The mounters worked in harmony to achieve their goal.
